description:
Parameters for creating a preset from current channel configuration

# Fields * `channel` - Speaker channel index (1-4) to capture configuration from * `name` - Human-readable preset name * `version` - Version string for the preset (e.g., "1.0") * `created_date` - Creation date in RFC3339 format (e.g., "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z") * `vendor_lock` - If true, encrypts the preset for vendor-only use

vendor_lock.description: Encrypt preset with vendor key (prevents user modification)

title: PresetCreateParams
